text:
HI everybody, I am new here so I don't know if this channel is the right one. But I am just going to try and maybe someone can point me in the right direction.

For my client I am looking to connect their externam phone provider with HubSpot.
In order to do that they need an API connection. But since API Keys are no longer available I am trying to set up an app.
However I am not sure how to set up the app and what to select in order to get it to work.

So basically, my client wants to use the phone provider to make calls via HubSpot with the current phone provider.
Also receive calls. So we can log the calls in HS when they come in.

Inbound calls
Outbound calls
Answered calls
Unanswered calls
Recording uploads

Can someone help/instruct me how to set up the app so I can send them the right info to make the connection?

Hi <@U06V3Q4QGGH> I have not done this but I believe you will need these two resources.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/calling-sdk>
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/receive-calls-in-HubSpot-when-using-calling-apps>
I will definitely check it out. Thanks for the reply <@U01NRM1BS3A>
